EmailTemplate.subject: Accelerate your Data Warehouse Modernization Journey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
According to TDWI, most organizations want to modernize their data warehouse infrastructure to better align with business goals. Many of these goals are part of a larger corporate trend towards digital transformation. Now is the time to consider Pivotal Greenplum <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-greenplum]]>, the first open source data warehouse, to accelerate your journey towards DW modernization and set the stage for your digital transformation.
It doesn’t matter what industry you’re in—your enterprise has the opportunity to use open source software, data, and analytics to redefine its relationship with customers and develop completely new business models to drive new levels of profitability and efficiency.
We invite you to take advantage of our library of Big Data and Digital Transformation resources, including:
- <[[http://greenplum.org/]]>Software Download: Greenplum Sandbox <[[http://greenplum.org/]]> - Case Study: Aridhia Powers Next-Gen Clinical Analytics Platform with Pivotal Greenplum <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/case-study/powering-the-next-generation-of-clinical-and-translational-informatics]]> - On-Demand Webinar: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016 <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016]]>
- Free one-day course on Greenplum: Part 1 <[[https://pivotal.litmos.com/course/206984?r=False&ts=635985782608709461]]>, Part 2 <[[https://pivotal.litmos.com/course/206991?r=False&ts=635985782608709461]]> and Part 3 <[[https://pivotal.litmos.com/course/207009?r=False&ts=635985782608709461]]>
To find out how Pivotal can help you on this journey, please join us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io]]>, August 1–4.
Now is the time to take the reins of your Digital Transformation. Let’s build something meaningful.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
